author: tonyler
content:
Stables/RWAs are issued on {X} chain, but believing they were created with the thought that they would stay only there is stupid.

Nothing gets locked on any chain anymore.

True winners are the rails that will be used to transfer stuff from one chain to another.

My top picks are projects that use IBC:
→ @cosmoshub
→ @tokifinance
→ @union_build

Anything else is a short-term solution that will soon be left behind (or get exploited).
title: The Future of Stables: Embrace Cross-Chain Solutions

author: paplianos
content:
A new market is here — and it’s here to stay.

Crypto isn’t a trend. It’s an emerging financial and technological layer that will reshape how value, ownership, and coordination work over the next decades.

That’s why the goal isn’t blind speculation.

It’s thinking long-term.

Invest wisely in crypto companies and protocols with:
 • clear vision
• real-world use cases
• the ability to deliver solutions, not just narratives
• innovation that can meaningfully improve lives in the future

Progress has never come from following old rules in a new system.

In this market — just like in life — those who think independently, take responsibility, and align with builders and innovators early tend to capture the real upside.

This is your capital.

This is your conviction.

Choose accordingly.

$ATOM
title: Investing Wisely in the Future of Crypto

title: Cosmos Hub December Report: Key Updates and Progress

author: paplianos
content:
@cosmoshub  Unit Report - December 2025 Summary 

Key updates from the Hub Unit (Cosmos Labs + Hypha):

 ICF Delegation Program: Final details being wrapped up with ICF. Launch expected mid-January 2026! More info soon via blog post. Validators: Join the Telegram channel for updates.

 @StargazeZone: NFT marketplace & collection on track for February launch. $STARS token migration planned for Q2 2026. Bi-weekly syncs ongoing for smooth process.

 Hypha Technical Ops: Steady month – no upgrades/incidents. Ongoing maintenance + tokenfactory progress: unit/integration tests complete, pre-audit prep underway. Key PRs merged.

 $ATOM Tokenomics RFP: Issued Dec 12 – seeking research firms for data-driven redesign (phases: Research/Audit, Modeling, Community support). Proposals due Jan 15, 2026. Selection soon after.

Solid steady progress building the future of the Hub! 

 https://forum.cosmos.network/t/hub-unit-report-december-2025/16568…
title: Cosmos Hub Unit Report - December 2025 Summary

author: Jim Cramer of Cøsmos
content:
Holy shit… Didn't expect such a low-quality post from Coin Bureau — but if you're going to talk about Cosmos, at least try to keep up.

- @penumbrazone has not shut down. It's still fully usable, validators are running, and the chain is being kept alive by the community while the team was effectively forced out for building real privacy.
- @osmosis is NOT in "maintenance mode". It keeps shipping features, powers @Polaris_App while stacking more BTC at the protocol level, and just rolled out a major tokenomics revamp. It's also one of the top chains by protocol revenue.
- noble is not "leaving Cosmos". It is spinning up an EVM chain for apps, which is an expansion move, not an exit. Native USDC will keep exisitng via IBC.

And that's just the stuff you somehow missed:

- @OndoFinance is coming to Cosmos.
- XRP spun up a chain on Cosmos.
- @babylonlabs_io launched on Cosmos.
- @stable launches on Cosmos.
- TAC launches on Cosmos.
- Cosmos Hub and @cosmoslabs_io are actively working on new tokenomics and business partnerships.
- There was a CBDC leak a few months ago that Cosmos Labs scrambled to suppress — and given how hard they tried to bury it, it's looking increasingly likely to happen.

Next time you want to farm engagement on @cosmos, just ask someone who actually tracks the ecosystem — or keep posting like this and watch your credibility evaporate.
